member.summary: Checks whether the specified property's value evaluates to true
member.param: Name of the property that will be checked
member.returns: True if the specified property's value evaluates to true
member.remarks: To avoid unneccessary complexity, only property values that evaluate to a numeric value other than 0 are considered being true. The string "true", for example, would be evaluated as meaning false.
